auto_readthedocs module¶

class auto_readthedocs.Directory(path_under_root: pathlib.Path, python_files, dirs)¶

Bases: object

document(docs_path)¶

Make rst hierarchy for all python files in the directory (recursively). Args:

docs_path: Path of the ‘docs’ directory.
static make_html(docs_path)¶

Create readthedocs website based on the previously created rst files. Args:

docs_path: Path of the ‘docs’ directory.
auto_readthedocs.excluded(directory: str)¶

Define excluded directories.

auto_readthedocs.find_files(root_dir: pathlib.Path)¶

Search for all the files in the tree structured from the root directory.

auto_readthedocs.is_python(file: pathlib.Path)¶

Return whether a file is a python file or not.

auto_readthedocs.not_excluded(directory: str)¶

Define not excluded directories.

auto_readthedocs.walk_level(some_dir: pathlib.Path)¶

Scan the first level of a directory.
